daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: New York City faces extreme cold and snow, impacting sanitation efforts, while a compactor fire in Tribeca and ongoing healthcare staffing shortages prompt a disaster emergency declaration; additionally, NYC parents express concerns over public school enrollment amid potential program changes.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- NYC faces extreme cold and snow, impacting sanitation services citywide. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
